author: T-
text: Disgusting DO NOT order from here
title: Disgusting DO NOT order from here

author: Joseph
text: Being that my shoes came from Hong Kong I had to use an app to make sure they were real. Even with a StockX tag I did not trust them coming from Asia. So I had to go through the CheckCheck app to make sure y’all are selling legit stuff. The Asian sticker with the shoe size on it was a big red flag
title: Being that my shoes came from Hong Kong…

author: Adrian
text: I'm still awaiting my sneakers for the past three weeks. Im also still waiting for an update onto what is going on with when I'm going to receive them.. this was my first time using stockx this may also be my last time.
title: No answer to where my sneakers are.

author: BA
text: apaulling service, rip off, scammers, zero customer service - cant return or exchange - con merchants. do not buy from this company- crooks
title: apaulling service

text: Fees are too high on stock x side
title: Fees are too high on stock x side

author: Krista
text: Ordered my son a pair of sneakers which cost me $331.70 & in 4 days they refunded my money back with no explanation whatsoever. Means less to say not good service, and a very disappointed boy. Will never order from this site again, first and last time
title: Ordered my son a pair of sneakers which…

author: Ricardo
text: The 1 star is due to the fact that you guys don’t allow someone to cancel an order, seconds after they placed it. “Goat” provides a cancellation button, so for that reason I would never purchase from stockx again.
title: The 1 star is due to the fact that you…

text: May be great for some, I am not a fan.
title: Oh well...

text: Buy a pair of AJ5 , stockx had problem with the seller
title: Buy a pair of AJ5

author: April
text:
I received the wrong item
And the reason I didn’t return was due to my son not having his shirt in time for his bday
title: I received the wrong item

author: Mariam
text: literally the worst, i placed an order online and they said it was delivered but i never received the package, after i made multiple claims to fedex, they tell me to reach out to my shipper and when i do that they tell me that they can’t do anything about it like what??!! It’s like they’ve never heard of waiting for your package, some people don’t know the policy especially when it’s your first time placing a delivery order with stock x.
title: literally the worst

author: Isabel
text: I heard great things about stockX... suppose to have the best quality and you pay for that too... I ordered a rare collectors toy, suppose to be new and in GREAT condition. It came damaged making worthless... the toy itself was gross and beat up. do they not know what they are doing at the authorization center? worst experience could have gotten better off eBay! after contacting stockx they only wanted to give me 10$ refund which was rude considering the amount I paid for a now worthless purchase. Also contacted stockX support and they basically said there was nothing they could do about it.
title: I heard great things, now will not ever be purchasing from here again...

author: Unhappy
text: Mistakenly ordered wrong size. No way to cancel order or return. No way to contact
title: Mistakenly ordered wrong size

author: Ruthann
text: Did not realize I was ordering from a third party, thought it was Nike, we ordered the wrong size, now they are not wanting to return them, these were very expensive shoes!!
title: Did not realize I was ordering from a…

author: Rilee
text: I purchased new jordan retro 12s. When I got my order in the mail, they were some really dirty old used Jordans! There was no stockx tag or receipt just old shoes in the box that said retro 12s. I feel scammed and want my full refund! Never using this site again! My outfit and plans were ruined!
title: Terrible!

author: Heather Padget
text: If u haven't got the stock don't bother taking peoples money, you left my daughter shattered for her bday when weeks later you emailed with no stock!
title: If u haven't got the stock don't bother…

author: Memphiz
text: No product. Bad first time experience.
title: No product

author: Brendan
text: Fix your exchange rate, I ordered shoes and it takes 2 weeks pshh thanks for the little bros gift but you enjoy your 1k shoes
title: Fix your exchange rate

author: MS
text: The shoes took a very long time to arrive. When they did arrive they appeared to be authentic but definitely were not new. I paid $270 total for a pair of used shoes. Definitely will not be doing business with them again.
title: Bad experience

author: Lindsey
text:
The ordering process was tricky and unclear. It kept trying to take me to the app before I was finished ordering. As a result I accidentally ended up ordering two pair of shoes....both at over $300...unfortunately stockxxx doesn't offer refunds even though I discovered the problem almost immediately after it had occurred. 
Luckily however, because of the two-step authentication process, one of the pairs of shoes was found to not be authentic at which point the company sent the shoes back to the seller and issued me a full refund. I was very relieved because I needed that money. But if I ever order from stockx again, I will be using a prepaid card with only the correct amount needed for the item being purchased.
title: The ordering process was tricky and…
